results.content: Course does not match it's title. The course gives a very fast overview of some HTML5 and CSS3 for building sites. As far as taking you to a paid web developer, the only instruction they give is how to find a domain name, register it, host it, and upload your page to it, and that you can look for work on freelancer.com. How about some professional tips on marketing your skills and how to land those jobs on freelancer.com (or anywhere else for that matter)?
results.content_html: Course does not match it's title. The course gives a very fast overview of some HTML5 and CSS3 for building sites. As far as taking you to a paid web developer, the only instruction they give is how to find a domain name, register it, host it, and upload your page to it, and that you can look for work on freelancer.com. How about some professional tips on marketing your skills and how to land those jobs on freelancer.com (or anywhere else for that matter)?

results.content: This is an excellent beginner or refresher course for html and css development.  I developed websites in the 90's and this is just what I needed to refresh and see what has changed in all these years.  It is easy to follow and the author provides exact course content. I highly recommend.

I developed websites in the 90's and this is just what I needed to refresh and see what has changed in all these years. It is easy to follow and the author provides exact course content. I highly recommend.

results.content:
Tons and tons of useful information on HTML and CSS. Really easy to follow along with the instructor. If your a beginner coder, I highly recommend this course. I really learned a lot and got a great understanding of how html works with CSS stylesheets and had fun at the same time.

Many thanks!
Ron Ratliff
